TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ToolBar extends System.Windows.Forms.Control

summary.span: 表示一个 Windows 工具栏。

span.span: Represents a Windows toolbar.

summary.span: 尽管 替换了早期版本的 控件并添加了功能；但是也可选择保留 以备向后兼容和将来使用。

span.span: Although replaces and adds functionality to the control of previous versions, is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件用于显示可显示为标准按钮、切换样式按钮或下拉样式按钮 控件。 controls are used to display controls that can appear as a standard button, a toggle-style button, or a drop-down style button. 您可以通过创建 ，将图像分配给工具栏的 "" 属性，然后将图像索引值分配给每个 的 属性，来将图像分配给这些按钮。You can assign images to the buttons by creating an , assigning it to the property of the toolbar, and assigning the image index value to the property each . 然后，可以通过设置 的 "" 属性来指定要在图像下方或右侧显示的文本。You can then assign text to be displayed underneath or to the right of the image by setting the property of the . 将工具栏的 "" 属性设置为 "，为工具栏及其按钮设置平面外观。Set the property of the toolbar to to give the toolbar and its buttons a flat appearance. 当鼠标指针移到按钮上时，其外观将变为三维。As the mouse pointer moves over the buttons, their appearance changes to three-dimensional. 可使用分隔符将工具栏按钮划分成多个逻辑组。Toolbar buttons can be divided into logical groups by using separators. 分隔符是 属性设置为 `ToolBarButtonStyle.Separator`的工具栏按钮。A separator is a toolbar button with the property set to `ToolBarButtonStyle.Separator`. 当工具栏具有平面外观时，按钮分隔符显示为线条，而不是按钮之间的空格。Button separators appear as lines rather than spaces between the buttons when the toolbar has a flat appearance. 如果 属性设置为 ，则工具栏按钮显示为凸起和三维。If the property is set to , the toolbar buttons appear raised and three-dimensional. 如果为 属性指定值，则工具栏中的所有按钮都将限制为指定的大小。If you specify a value for the property, all buttons in the tool bar are restricted to the specified size. 否则，按钮会根据其内容调整其大小， 属性将返回最大按钮的初始大小。Otherwise, the buttons adjust their size depending on their content, and the property returns the initial size of the largest button. 若要创建要在 上显示的 控件的集合，请使用 属性的 或 方法分别添加按钮。To create a collection of controls to display on the , add the buttons individually by using the or methods of the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 和三个 控件。The following code example creates a and three controls. 工具栏按钮将分配给按钮集合，集合将分配给工具栏，并将工具栏添加到窗体中。The toolbar buttons are assigned to the button collection, the collection is assigned to the toolbar, and the toolbar is added to the form. 在工具栏的 事件上，计算 的 属性，并打开相应的对话框。On the event of the toolbar, the property of the is evaluated, and the appropriate dialog box opened. 此代码要求创建 、、和 。This code requires that a , an , a , and a have been created. [!code-cpp[Classic ToolBar.ToolBar Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBar.ToolBar Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ToolBar.ToolBar Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBar.ToolBar Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ToolBar.ToolBar Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBar.ToolBar Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置值，该值确定工具栏控件及其按钮的外观。

span.span: Gets or set the value that determines the appearance of a toolbar control and its buttons.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性会影响分配给工具栏的按钮的外观。The property affects the appearance of the buttons assigned to the toolbar. 如果将 "外观" 设置为 "`ToolBarAppearance.Normal`"，则工具栏的按钮将显示为三维并引发。When the appearance is set to `ToolBarAppearance.Normal`, the toolbar's buttons appear three-dimensional and raised. 将工具栏的 "" 属性设置为 "`ToolBarAppearance.Flat`，以将工具栏按钮设置为平面外观。Set the property of the toolbar to `ToolBarAppearance.Flat` to give the toolbar's buttons a flat appearance. 当鼠标指针移动到平面按钮上时，它们将显示为凸起和三维。As the mouse pointer moves over the flat buttons, they appear raised and three-dimensional. 属性设置为 "" 的 上的分隔符显示为蚀刻线条，而不是凸起的按钮之间的空格。Separators on a with the property set to appear as etched lines rather than spaces between the raised buttons. 平面样式按钮为应用程序带来了类似于 Web 的外观。The flat style buttons give your application a more Web-like look. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 控件，设置其一些通用属性，并将其添加到 中。The following code example creates a control, sets some of its common properties, and adds it to a . 还会将委托添加到 和 事件。Delegates are also added to the and events. 此示例需要声明一个名为 `toolBar1` 的 和一个名为 `imageList1` 的 。This example requires that a named `toolBar1` and an named `imageList1` have been declared. [!code-cpp[ToolBar#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolBar/CPP/mytoolbar.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ToolBar#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolBar/CS/mytoolbar.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ToolBar#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolBar/VB/mytoolbar.vb#1)]

exception.span: 分配的值不是 值之一。

span.span: The assigned value is not one of the values.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示工具栏是否根据按钮的大小和停靠样式自动调整其大小。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the toolbar adjusts its size automatically, based on the size of the buttons and the dock style.

value.span: 如果工具栏根据按钮大小和停靠样式自动调整其大小，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the toolbar adjusts its size automatically, based on the size of the buttons and dock style; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 设置为 `true`时， 控件将根据按钮的大小、它包含的 对象的数目以及工具栏的 调整其大小以适应工具栏按钮。When is set to `true`, the control sizes itself to accommodate the toolbar buttons, based upon the button size, the number of objects it contains, and the of the toolbar. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 控件，设置其一些通用属性，并将其添加到 中。The following code example creates a control, sets some of its common properties, and adds it to a . 还会将委托添加到 和 事件。Delegates are also added to the and events. 此示例需要声明一个名为 `toolBar1` 的 和一个名为 `imageList1` 的 。This example requires that a named `toolBar1` and an named `imageList1` have been declared. [!code-cpp[ToolBar#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolBar/CPP/mytoolbar.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ToolBar#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolBar/CS/mytoolbar.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ToolBar#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolBar/VB/mytoolbar.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告 事件的发生。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑将 替换为 或将消息附加到多行 中。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为 `ToolBar1` 类型实例的项目中。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ToolBar1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与 事件关联。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#564](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#564)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#564](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#564)]

One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 属性设置为 `BorderStyle.Fixed3D`时， 可以采用凹陷、三维的外观。The can take on a sunken, three-dimensional appearance when the property is set to `BorderStyle.Fixed3D`. 若要在工具栏控件周围显示平细边框，请将 属性设置为 `BorderStyle.FixedSingle`。To display a flat thin border around the toolbar control, set the property to `BorderStyle.FixedSingle`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 控件，设置其一些通用属性，并将其添加到 中。The following code example creates a control, sets some of its common properties, and adds it to a . 还会将委托添加到 和 事件。Delegates are also added to the and events. 此示例需要声明一个名为 `toolBar1` 的 和一个名为 `imageList1` 的 。This example requires that a named `toolBar1` and an named `imageList1` have been declared. [!code-cpp[ToolBar#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolBar/CPP/mytoolbar.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ToolBar#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolBar/CS/mytoolbar.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ToolBar#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolBar/VB/mytoolbar.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取分配给工具栏控件的 控件集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of controls assigned to the toolbar control.

value.span: 一个包含 控件集合的 。

span.span: A that contains a collection of controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是从零开始的索引集合，用于保存分配给工具栏的所有 控件。The property is a zero-based indexed collection used to hold all the controls assigned to the toolbar. 由于属性是只读的，因此不能直接向其分配工具栏按钮的集合。Because the property is read-only, it can not be assigned a collection of toolbar buttons directly. 可以通过使用从 类继承的方法来添加或移除工具栏按钮。Toolbar buttons can be added or removed by using the methods inherited from the class. 使用 方法可添加各个按钮和 方法以删除按钮。Use the method to add individual buttons and the method to delete a button. 调用 方法可从集合中删除所有按钮。Call the method to remove all the buttons from the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建并初始化一个 和三个 控件。The following code example creates and initializes a and three controls. 工具栏按钮将分配给工具栏，工具栏将添加到窗体中。The toolbar buttons are assigned to the toolbar and the toolbar is added to the form. 此代码要求已创建 。This code requires that a has already been created. [!code-cpp[Classic ToolBar.Buttons Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBar.Buttons Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ToolBar.Buttons Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBar.Buttons Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ToolBar.Buttons Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBar.Buttons Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置工具栏控件上按钮的大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the size of the buttons on the toolbar control.

value.span: 表示工具栏上 控件大小的 对象。

span.span: A object that represents the size of the controls on the toolbar.

value.span: 默认大小为宽 24 个像素、高 22 个像素，或足以容纳 和文本，取其中的较大者。

span.span: The default size has a width of 24 pixels and a height of 22 pixels, or large enough to accommodate the and text, whichever is greater.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未设置 ，则将其设置为默认值。If the is not set, it is set to its default. 或者，计算 以容纳分配给 控件的最大 和文本。Alternatively, a is computed to accommodate the largest and text assigned to the controls. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 控件，设置其一些通用属性，并将其添加到 中。The following code example creates a control, sets some of its common properties, and adds it to a . 还会将委托添加到 和 事件。Delegates are also added to the and events. 此示例需要声明一个名为 `toolBar1` 的 和一个名为 `imageList1` 的 。This example requires that a named `toolBar1` and an named `imageList1` have been declared. summary.span: 释放 使用的非托管资源，并选择性地释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由 public `Dispose` 方法和 方法调用。This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the method. `Dispose` 调用受保护的 `Dispose(Boolean)` 方法，并将 `disposing` 参数设置为 `true`。`Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用 `disposing` 设置为 `false`的 `Dispose`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法将调用每个被引用对象的 `Dispose` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写时，请注意不要引用先前在调用 之前已释放的对象。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现 的详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose).

para.span: 有关 和 的详细信息，请参阅[清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged)和[重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示工具栏是否显示分隔符。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 显示分隔线有助于区分工具栏与相邻控件（如菜单）。Dividers are displayed to help distinguish the toolbar from adjacent controls, such as menus. 分隔线显示为沿 控件顶部的凸起边缘。A divider is displayed as a raised edge along the top of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 控件，设置其一些通用属性，并将其添加到 中。The following code example creates a control, sets some of its common properties, and adds it to a . 还会将委托添加到 和 事件。Delegates are also added to the and events. 此示例需要声明一个名为 `toolBar1` 的 和一个名为 `imageList1` 的 。This example requires that a named `toolBar1` and an named `imageList1` have been declared. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 设置为 `false`，则下拉样式工具栏按钮上将不显示向下箭头。When is set to `false`, no down arrows display on drop-down style toolbar buttons. 当用户单击工具栏上的下拉按钮时，菜单会下拉以供选择。When the user clicks the drop-down button on the toolbar, the menu drops down for selection. 显示下拉箭头时，用户必须按向下箭头才能显示菜单。When the drop-down arrow is displayed, the user must press the down arrow to display the menu. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 控件，设置其一些通用属性，并将其添加到 中。The following code example creates a control, sets some of its common properties, and adds it to a . 还会将委托添加到 和 事件。Delegates are also added to the and events. 此示例需要声明一个名为 `toolBar1` 的 和一个名为 `imageList1` 的 。This example requires that a named `toolBar1` and an named `imageList1` have been declared. summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要设置工具提示显示的文本，请在 上设置每个 的 属性。To set the text displayed by the ToolTip, set the property of each on the . 若要在用户将鼠标指针移到工具栏按钮上时显示工具提示，请将 属性设置为 `true`。To cause the ToolTip to display as the user moves the mouse pointer over the toolbar button, set the property to `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 控件，设置其一些通用属性，并将其添加到 中。The following code example creates a control, sets some of its common properties, and adds it to a . 还会将委托添加到 和 事件。Delegates are also added to the and events. 此示例需要声明一个名为 `toolBar1` 的 和一个名为 `imageList1` 的 。This example requires that a named `toolBar1` and an named `imageList1` have been declared. MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Wrappable { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Wrappable : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示如果工具栏太小以致无法在同一行显示所有按钮，工具栏按钮是否换到下一行。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the toolbar buttons wrap to the next line if the toolbar becomes too small to display all the buttons on the same line.

value.span: 如果在工具栏太小以致无法在同一行内显示所有按钮时工具栏按钮换行，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the toolbar buttons wrap to another line if the toolbar becomes too small to display all the buttons on the same line; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可使用分隔符将工具栏按钮划分成多个逻辑组。Toolbar buttons can be divided into logical groups by using separators. 分隔符是 属性设置为 `ToolBarButtonStyle.Separator`的工具栏按钮。A separator is a toolbar button with the property set to `ToolBarButtonStyle.Separator`. 如果 属性设置为 "`true`，工具栏变得太小而无法在同一行显示所有按钮，则会将该工具栏分解为其他行，并在分隔符处发生中断。If the property is set to `true` and the toolbar becomes too small to display all the buttons on the same line, the toolbar is broken into additional lines, with the breaks occurring at the separators. 这可确保按钮组保持在一起。This ensures that button groups stay together. 在工具栏换行时，不在组中的工具栏按钮可以分隔。Toolbar buttons that are not in a group can be separated when the toolbar wraps. 如果工具栏的父 大小调整，工具栏可能会变得太小，无法在同一行上显示所有按钮。The toolbar can become too small to display all its buttons on the same line if its parent is resized. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 控件，设置其一些通用属性，并将其添加到 中。The following code example creates a control, sets some of its common properties, and adds it to a . 还会将委托添加到 和 事件。Delegates are also added to the and events. 此示例需要声明一个名为 `toolBar1` 的 和一个名为 `imageList1` 的 。This example requires that a named `toolBar1` and an named `imageList1` have been declared. [!code-cpp[ToolBar#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolBar/CPP/mytoolbar.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ToolBar#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolBar/CS/mytoolbar.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ToolBar#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolBar/VB/mytoolbar.vb#1)]
